YSC: This cookie is set by YouTube to track views of embedded videos.

CONSENT: This cookie carries out information about how the end user uses the website and any advertising that the end user may have seen before visiting the said website.
PREF: This cookie, which may be set by Google or Doubleclick, may be used by advertising partners to build a profile of interests to show relevant ads on other sites. It works by uniquely identifying your browser and device.

test_cookie: This cookie is set by doubleclick.net. The purpose of the cookie is to determine if the user's browser supports cookies.
fr: The cookie is set by Facebook to show relevant advertisments to the users and measure and improve the advertisements. The cookie also tracks the behavior of the user across the web on sites that have Facebook pixel or Facebook social plugin.

s_invisit: Adobe Site Catalyst cookie, counts the visits made by a user to the site
s_nr: Adobe Site Catalyst cookie, stores date of visit and if visitor is new or returning
s_vnum: Adobe Site Catalyst cookie, stores the number of visits made by a user to the site
s_lv: Adobe Site Catalyst cookie, stores the date of visit
s_lv_s: Adobe Site Catalyst cookie, stores the date of visit
s_vi: Adobe Site Catalyst cookie, used to identify unique visitors, with an ID and timestamp
s_sq: Adobe Site Catalyst cookie, used to store information about the previous link clicked on by the user
s_cc: Adobe Site Catalyst cookie, determines whether cookies are enabled in the browser
ad-privacy: This cookie is generally provided by amazon-adsystem.com for advertising purposes.
session-id: Session Cookies are used by the server to store information about user page activities so users can easily pick up where they left off on the server's pages.
session-id-time: Session Cookies are used by the server to store information about user page activities so users can easily pick up where they left off on the server's pages.
ubid-main: This cookie is used to store information about how the user uses the website such as what pages have been loaded and any other advertisement before visiting the website.
amzn: This cookie is generally provided by amazon-adsystem.com for advertising purposes.
apay-session-set: This cookie is generally provided by amazon-adsystem.com for advertising purposes.

m_session: This cookie is for video functionality for live eventsby geolocation.
lang: This cookie is used to store the language preferences of a user to serve up content in that stored language the next time user visit the website.
Authorization: This cookie is used to store the user's access token.
